item.title: Help with my new addition!
item.dc:creator: @jurm jurm
item.description:
@jurm wrote:

case 24135: //Duel Mode On
{
inwildy = true;
sendMessage("Duel Mode on, its like the wilderness anywhere!");
sendMessage("Remember, you can only attack others in the wild or that also have duel mode on!");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " has activated duel mode! Hooray!";


outStream.createFrameVarSize(104);
outStream.writeByteC(3);        // command slot (does it matter which one?)
outStream.writeByteA(1);        // 0 or 1; 1 if command should be placed on top in context menu
outStream.writeString("Attack");
outStream.endFrameVarSize();
break;
}
case 24134: // Duel Mode Off
{
inwildy = false;
sendMessage("Duel Mode has been turned off...");
sendMessage("Phew, that was close, huh?");
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName + " has turned off duel mode. Boo!";
break;
}

The idea was to make it so if the option was set to “On”, you could attack people in the wilderness from outside OR to attack other people with the setting to “On”. How would I make it so that other people can attack eachother if the option is set?

Read full topic
